document_data.mainbody:
Corwins armor was an enchanted suit of chainmail armor that was custom-made for Captain Schael Corwin, an officer of the Flaming Fist.
Extremely well-crafted and lightweight, especially for chainmail, the armor granted Captain Corwin great freedom of movement and allowed her to move at a brisk pace.
The armor possessed a +2 enchantment and partially protected its wearer from harmful magic.
It was commissioned by Schaels father Audamar, and gifted to her when she gained admittance into the Flaming Fist.
